settings.name: Auto/Manual Swt. Set.
settings.description: Access to auto/manual switching settings

settings.name: Av Auto/Manual Switch
settings.description: Sets the method for switching aperture between auto and manual modes

settings.name: Tv Auto/Manual Switch
settings.description: Sets the method for switching shutter speed between auto and manual modes

settings.name: ISO Auto/Manual Swit.
settings.description: Sets the method for switching ISO between auto and manual modes

settings.name: Exposure Comp.
settings.description: Compensates for the entire image brightness

settings.name: Reset EV Comp.
settings.description: Sets whether to maintain the exposure value when turning off the power

settings.name: ISO
settings.description: Sets ISO sensitivity

settings.name: ISO AUTO Min. SS
settings.description: Sets the shutter speed at which ISO sensitivity starts changing in ISO AUTO mode

settings.name: Metering Mode
settings.description: Selects the method for measuring brightness

settings.name: Face Priority in Multi
settings.description: Sets whether the camera measures brightness based on detected faces in Multi metering mode

settings.name: Spot Metering Point
settings.description: Sets whether to coordinate the spot metering position with the focus area

settings.name: Exposure step
settings.description: Sets the increment step for shutter speed, aperture, and exposure

settings.name: AEL w/ shutter
settings.description: Sets whether to perform AE lock when pressing the shutter button halfway

settings.name: Exposure Std. Adjust
settings.description: Adjusts the camera's standard for correct exposure value

settings.name: Flash Mode
settings.description: Sets the flash mode

settings.name: Flash Comp.
settings.description: Adjusts the flash output

settings.name: Exp.comp.set
settings.description: Sets whether exposure compensation value applies to both flash and ambient light or only ambient

settings.name: Wireless Flash
settings.description: Sets whether to use wireless flash

settings.name: Red Eye Reduction
settings.description: Reduces red-eye phenomenon with flash

settings.name: External Flash Set.
settings.description: Access to external flash settings

settings.name: White Balance
settings.description: Adjusts the color tones according to the light source

settings.name: Priority Set in AWB
settings.description: Sets which tone to prioritize in auto white balance under light sources like incandescent light

settings.name: DRO/Auto HDR
settings.description: Access to dynamic range optimization and auto HDR settings

settings.name: Creative Look
settings.description: Selects the desired image processing with rich gradation and colors

settings.name: Picture Profile
settings.description: Changes settings such as color and gradation for movie recording

settings.name: Soft Skin Effect
settings.description: Sets the Soft Skin Effect and the effect level

settings.name: White Balance
settings.description: Adjusts the color tones according to the light source

settings.name: Priority Set in AWB
settings.description: Sets which tone to prioritize in auto white balance under light sources like incandescent light

settings.name: Shutter AWB Lock
settings.description: Sets whether to lock white balance during shutter press in auto white balance mode

settings.name: Shockless WB
settings.description: Sets the transition speed when the white balance setting is changed

settings.name: White Balance Bracketing
settings.description: Sets white balance bracketing for multiple shots with different color temperatures
